item.title: UK arrests 'Scattered Spider' teens linked to Transport for London hack
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Two teenagers, believed to be linked to the August 2024 cyberattack on Transport for London, have been arrested in the United Kingdom. [...]

item.title: SystemBC malware turns infected VPS systems into proxy highway
item.dc:creator: Ionut Ilascu
item.description: The operators of the SystemBC proxy botnet are hunting for vulnerable commercial virtual private servers (VPS) and maintain an average of 1,500 bots every day that provide a highway for malicious traffic. [...]

item.title: Target-rich environment: Why Microsoft 365 has become the biggest risk
item.dc:creator: Sponsored by Acronis
item.description: Microsoft 365's dominance and tight integration makes it a massive target in today's cyber landscape. Its tight integration expands the attack surface and amplifies risk. Learn from Acronis TRU why backup blind spots & lateral movement risks demand stronger defenses. [...]

item.title: Notepad gets free AI features on Copilot+ PCs with Windows 11
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft is adding free AI-powered text writing capabilities to Notepad for customers with Copilot+ PCs running Windows 11. [...]

item.title: PyPI invalidates tokens stolen in GhostAction supply chain attack
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: The Python Software Foundation team has invalidated all PyPI tokens stolen in the GhostAction supply chain attack in early September, confirming that the threat actors didn't abuse them to publish malware. [...]

item.title: WatchGuard warns of critical vulnerability in Firebox firewalls
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: WatchGuard has released security updates to address a remote code execution vulnerability impacting the company's Firebox firewalls. [...]

item.title: Google patches sixth Chrome zero-day exploited in attacks this year
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Google has released emergency security updates to patch a Chrome zero-day vulnerability, the sixth one tagged as exploited in attacks since the start of the year. [...]

item.title: ShinyHunters claims 1.5 billion Salesforce records stolen in Drift hacks
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: The ShinyHunters extortion group claims to have stolen over 1.5 billion Salesforce records from 760 companies using compromised Salesloft Drift OAuth tokens. [...]

item.title: VC giant Insight Partners warns thousands after ransomware breach
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: New York-based venture capital and private equity firm Insight Partners is notifying thousands of individuals whose personal information was stolen in a ransomware attack. [...]

item.title: SonicWall warns customers to reset credentials after breach
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: SonicWall warned customers today to reset credentials after their firewall configuration backup files were exposed in a security breach that impacted MySonicWall accounts. [...]

item.title: Microsoft: Office 2016 and Office 2019 reach end of support next month
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​​​​​Microsoft reminded customers again this week that Office 2016 and Office 2019 will reach the end of extended support in less than 30 days, on October 14, 2025. [...]

item.title: From ClickFix to MetaStealer: Dissecting Evolving Threat Actor Techniques
item.dc:creator: Sponsored by Huntress
item.description: ClickFix isn't just back—it's mutating. New variants use fake CAPTCHAs, File Explorer tricks & MSI lures to drop MetaStealer. Stay ahead with Huntress' Tradecraft Tuesday threat briefings. [...]

item.title: Microsoft and Cloudflare disrupt massive RaccoonO365 phishing service
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft and Cloudflare have disrupted a massive Phishing-as-a-Service (PhaaS) operation, known as RaccoonO365, that helped cybercriminals steal thousands of Microsoft 365 credentials. [...]
